name: Donnelly Strada USH 650B x 50 Folding Tire
description: This durable, high-volume tire is a fast companion for adventure bike touring. At 50mm wide, it provides more grip and comfort than you might expect. The smooth rolling centre and grippy edges let you staightline it with speed and remain in control through corners.Fast, durable and smooth rolling centre tread.Exaggerated chevron pattern on sides for cornering traction.Integrated puncture protection belt under the tread.True story: USH is the airport code of Ushuaia in Tierra del Fuego, Argentina, the world's southern-most city, and destination for adventure bike touring.
